actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform
actions.subcommittee: Federal Workforce, Post Office, and the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Workforce, Post Office, and the District of Columbia.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Federal Workforce, Post Office, and the District of Columbia

official_title: To ensure pay parity for Federal employees serving at Joint Base McGuire/Dix/Lakehurst.
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text: Requires the pay schedules and rates to be used for purposes of any determination of pay for a federal employee serving at Joint Base McGuire/Dix/Lakehurst to be the same as if such employee were serving in the pay locality, wage area, or other area or locality that includes Ocean County, New Jersey.

titles.title: To ensure pay parity for Federal employees serving at Joint Base McGuire/Dix/Lakehurst.
